name: dataflow-bq-http
description: A Dataflow pipeline that reads from BigQuery, calls an HTTP endpoint, and writes to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input_table
parameters.label: Input BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to read from.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to write to.

parameters.name: sdk_container_image
parameters.label: SDK Container Image
parameters.helpText: The custom SDK container image to use for Dataflow workers.
